ja328:3.3: Yāva byāti nimisati → yava pāti nimmisati (bj); yāvuppatti nimissati (sya1ed, sya2ed); yāva pāti nimisati (pts-vp-pli1)
ja328:3.4: rasatī → saratī vayo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); saratibbayo (pts-vp-pli1)
ja328:4.4: vītaṁ ananusociyan”ti → cavitaṁ ananusociyanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); matantaṁ nānusociyaṁ (mr)
